description:
This versatile belay/rappel device has an assisted braking design for secure catches and smooth rope feeding. The Bulletproof carabiner has a steel insert that lasts longer than aluminum. It offers good braking performance, yet you can pay out rope fast to keep up with the leader by holding the device open with your thumb.

  • Belay device is robust stainless steel construction for longevity
  • Configuration allows belaying a leader or bringing up 2 seconds
  • Small eyelet takes a carabiner to release the unit when bringing up a partner
  • Carabiner has steel insert to prevent premature wear from rope friction
  • Spring bar holds carabiner in place when belaying to prevent cross loading
name: Edelrid MegaJul + HMS Bulletproof Screw FG
